@Krish Perera jvp aka  unp aka  dekama akai oya un kiyana awa piligattata apita karanna deyak na. anit aka 2015 balayata awe mineemaruwo allanna kudukarayo allanna dusitayo allanna ounta jampar andanna kiyala needa  balaya awe ko alluwa da naneeda  a kale awa nokara dan ayemat a parana tikama kiyawanawa. warade karala tibuna nam  pahu giya kale awa oppu karala neetiye ederiye daduwam dennane tibune ahe kara nam apita kisi aulak na. namut a kale a wedeyata nokara dan munada mekiyawanne. kiyawana unta lajjat na awa ahana ubalatat lajja na. suduwanwali hari kamak na me jvp sewalayo ussan muhudata danna one. ape nam elleema akai. me rate muna taram pasna teyenawada awa kata katakarannane palimets akata yawanne. akada mun me karanne. aka akata kade gihin aka aka tani pudgalayangen pali gannada munwa palimets yawanne. hide hare wedeyatat warade de warade wedeyatat dakenna puluwan wenna one. munta me anduwe aka hodakwat pennatte ai. akenma terenawa mun labapu darunu parajaye wedanawa anit aya pitin yawanna hadanawa kiyala. maha matiwaranede jvp akata  aka palimets putuwak hari denaganna puwan unot aka luku deyak.
